alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 7:40AM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Snow accumulation in excess of 6 inches are possible for the lower elevations, and in excess of 12 inches for the higher elevations. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan and southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Huerfano and Las Animas Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
